content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 16, 2024 Medicare Breach A Wake-Up Call for Better Data Protection September 16, 2024 Another data breach. Nearly 1 million Medicare beneficiaries potentially impacted, with their most personal info exposed for who knows how long. Its like a broken record, isnt it? Every few months another big company makes the news because they failed to protect YOUR data. Stop Saying Good Enough Security! Robust data protection solutions are key to preventing breaches like the Medicare breach.
